pageContext.title: Narratives That Heal
pageContext.description_excerpt: This was a 2002 Faculty Fellowship project of Professor Carolina Robertson from the Ethnomusicology Department. Based on the core premise that creativity is not necessarily a state of grace rooted in innate talent or skill, a series of seminars were offered through the University's 'Teachers as Scholars' program, in which teacher participants explored their own life narratives as doorways to creativity against a backdrop of parallel stories from other cultures. Dr. Robertson worked with a MITH programmer to develop an interactive website with malleable texts, sounds and images as the dynamic outcome of this process.
pageContext.participants: Amit Kumar, Carolina Robertson, George Williams, Jason Rhody, Susan Schreibman, Thomas Stanley, Yi Weng
